thread.section_title: PromGirl Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PromGirl | www.promgirl.com | 7 of 539
thread.title: Hailey

author: Hailey
title: Hailey
text: At first I was afraid of the sizing because I've never ordered from promgirl before, so I actually went a size up to an XL rather than a L. This dress literally fits a of my curves perfectly, and it's super duper comfy. Definitely would recommend for someone who wants a more laid back kind of dress. The shipping was a little slower than I thought but other than that, everything was perfect!
